[[File:Mumbai Skyline at Night.jpg|thumb|[[Mumbai]] night skyline]] [[File:Worli_skyline_from_Bandra.jpg|thumb|right|Worli, Mumbai skyline]] [[File:Mumbai Downtown.jpg|thumb|right|Mumbai skyline]] [[File:ImperialMumbai.JPG|thumb|[[The Imperial, Mumbai|The Imperial Towers]], [[Mumbai]] are the tallest in India.]] [[File:Ambani house mumbai.jpg|thumb|[[Antilia Mumbai|Antilia]] as seen from Altamount Road, [[Mumbai]]]] [[File:Bombay12.jpg|thumb|right|[[Shreepati Arcade]]]] [[File:Mumbai night skyline.jpg|thumb|right|MVRDC at [[Cuffe Parade]]]]
[[Mumbai]], the commercial and financial capital of [[India]], has most of the high-rise buildings in India where land is expensive. More than 2000 high-rise buildings are already constructed in Mumbai [[Mumbai Metropolitan Region|MMR]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.emporis.com/en/wm/ci/bu/sk/?id=102037 |title=Skyscrapers of Mumbai |publisher=Emporis.com |date=2009-06-15 |accessdate=2010-07-16}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.emporis.com/en/wm/ci/bu/sk/?id=101456 |title=Skyscrapers of Navi Mumbai |publisher=Emporis.com |date=2009-06-15 |accessdate=2010-07-16}}</ref>
In addition to more than a thousand mid-rises existing already (a building of above 12 floors is classified as a [[mid-rise]], and buildings with 25 floors or {{convert|90|m|ft|0}} in height are classified as [[high-rise]]s), the city is undergoing a massive construction boom, with hundreds of high-rises and more than 85 [[skyscraper]]s under construction.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.businessworld.in/bw/2010_07_17_Heaven_On_Earth.html?offset=1&max=1 |title=Heaven On Earth |publisher=Businessworld.in |date=2010-07-17 |accessdate=2010-07-30}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://week.manoramaonline.com/cgi-bin/MMOnline.dll/portal/ep/theWeekContent.do?sectionName=Business&contentId=7484495&programId=1073754899&pageTypeId=1073754893&contentType=EDITORIAL |title=The week- Mumbaiâs skyline is getting crowded |publisher=Week.manoramaonline.com |date= |accessdate=2010-08-23}}</ref>
==Tallest buildings== This lists ranks buildings in Mumbai that stand at least {{convert|90|m|ft|abbr=on}} tall, based on standard height measurement. This includes [[spire]]s and architectural details but does not include [[Radio masts and towers|antenna masts]]. Only completed buildings and under construction buildings that have been [[Topping out|topped out]] are included.
